body:
## Expected Behavior
Golang Vulnerability [CVE-2021-44716](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-44716) is NOT present in Temporal binaries such as temporal-server. **Apparently this is fixed in Golang v1.17.5.**

## Actual Behavior
Golang Vulnerability [CVE-2021-44716 ](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-44716) is present in Temporal binaries such as temporal-server.


## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

1. Deploy Temporal Server using temporal-server or temporal-auto-setup container images from https://hub.docker.com/u/temporalio
2. Run a container image vulnerability scan (e.g. Twistlock) on the image from 1.

## Specifications

  - Version: Had tested up to v1.14.4
  - Platform: linuxamd64

Ref: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/issues/2184
title: Golang Vulnerability CVE-2021-44716 in Temporal base-builder image
